#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{ int t,pen,n,x,y,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    { pen=0;
              scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&x,&y);
              int a[n],b[n];
              for(i=0;i<n;i++)
              
                              scanf("%d%d",&a[i],&b[i]);
                              sort(a,a+n);
                              sort(b,b+n);
                              
                          for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                          {
                                          if(a[i]==b[i])
                                          continue;
                                          
                                       else   if(b[i]>a[i])
                                                pen+=(b[i]-a[i])*x;  
                                                  
                              else
                              pen+=(a[i]-b[i])*y;
                              }
                              
              printf("%d\n",pen);
              }
              return 0;
              }
